# Documentation Templates

> **Status**: ðŸ“ Under Construction  
> **Last Updated**: 2024-11-19

## Overview

This directory contains templates for creating new documentation.

## Available Templates

- [ADR Template](adr-template.md) - Architecture Decision Record template
- [Viewpoint Template](viewpoint-template.md) - Architectural viewpoint template
- [Perspective Template](perspective-template.md) - Quality perspective template
- [Runbook Template](runbook-template.md) - Operational runbook template

## Using Templates

1. Copy the appropriate template
2. Fill in the required sections
3. Follow the structure and format
4. Update metadata (dates, owners, etc.)

## Template Standards

All templates follow:
- Consistent structure
- Clear section headers
- Metadata frontmatter
- Related documentation links
